Package zuul

Class GameText

java.lang.Object
zuul.GameText
public class GameText
extends java.lang.Object
A helper class representing the locale of the "World of Zuul" application.

This class stores the locale for the running instance of the application. Handles retrieval and formatting of locale-dependent text from resource bundles. Handles retrieval of locale-independent command words for the application.

Structure for helper class adapted from Utku Ã–zdemir on stack overflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19686476/java-internationalization-do-i-have-to-load-a-resource-bundle-for-every-class

  • Method Details

    • setLocale

      public static void setLocale​(java.util.Locale localeToSet)
      Sets the locale of this application.
      Parameters:
      localeToSet - the locale to set this application to, not null

    • getString

      public static java.lang.String getString​(java.lang.String key)
      Gets the locale-dependent String for the specified key from the standard resource bundle ("GameTextBundle") for the current locale.

      This method throws a java.util.MissingResourceException if no String for the given key can be found.

      Parameters:
      key - the locale-independent key corresponding to the locale-dependent String, not null
      Returns:
      the locale-dependent String corresponding to the key, not null
      Throws:
      java.util.MissingResourceException - if no String for the given key can be found

    • getString

      public static java.lang.String getString​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object[] arguments)
      Gets the locale-dependent String for the specified key from the standard resource bundle ("GameTextBundle") for the current locale and formats it with the specified arguments.

      This method throws a java.util.MissingResourceException if no String for the given key can be found.

      Parameters:
      key - the locale-independent key corresponding to the locale-dependent String, not null
      arguments - the arguments to be used in formatting the locale-dependent String, not null
      Returns:
      the locale-dependent String corresponding to the key formatted with the specified arguments, not null
      Throws:
      java.util.MissingResourceException - if no String for the given key can be found

    • getString

      public static java.lang.String getString​(java.lang.String bundle, java.lang.String key)
      Gets the locale-dependent String for the specified key from the specified resource bundle for the current locale.

      This method throws a java.util.MissingResourceException if no String for the given key can be found.

      Parameters:
      bundle - the resource bundle to search for the key, not null
      key - the locale-independent key corresponding to the locale-dependent String, not null
      Returns:
      the locale-dependent String corresponding to the key, not null
      Throws:
      java.util.MissingResourceException - if no String for the given key can be found
